RunData

Class RunCntl

  • java.lang.Object
    • RunData.RunCntl

  • public class RunCntl
extends java.lang.Object
    The RunCntl will get and set the information related to each individual run from the snowboard and place it into the application. The user will be able to see how well they did in varying categories on their run including: speed, distance, duration, G-Force, number of falls and altitude obtained. This information will feed into the ViewRunData class where the frame and panels for display will be made.

      • improvementSpeedGraph

        public void improvementSpeedGraph(java.util.ArrayList pastSpeeds)
        This will take the ArrayList all of the speeds from past runs and place them into a graph. This is simply a brief overview before the user looks into the details of their averages in the view aggregate data.
        Parameters:
        pastSpeeds - This is an ArrayList of the past speeds from other runs.
